title: Birthday Party
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 73 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 160L
description: Two children must go shopping and gather all the things they'll need for the party. But their hard work pays off in the end. Repeated text patterns support the introduction of new vocabulary.
reviewWords: bakery, balloon, birthday, games, party, shopping
phonics: Consonants : Associate the letter Ee with the short vowel sound /e/
